channel.title: How do you change the names of spells?
channel.description: I reeeeally want to know...and I also need to know how to add item requirements (like a god staff and a god cape to use a god spell)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2008, 06:53:35 PM[/size][hr]I accually JUST found out how to do the renaming, so nowall i need is the item EQUIPPED like the god stave
